Episodes.Title: Mugging
Episodes.Plot: Mark has a run-in with some muggers, who steal his precious blackberry - and put him off his stroke with Sophie as a result... Meanwhile, Jeremy faces a tricky dilemma over the love of his life and a potential threesome.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, sexual content, drug use and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Rosie Cavaliero, Josef Altin, Mark Wakeling, Sophie Winkleman, Shelly Blond

Episodes.Title: Sectioning
Episodes.Plot: Mark and Sophie are finally beginning to go steady when Sophie is moved away from London for work. Mark is devastated, so Sophie offers phone sex as a solution, which Mark nervously accepts. Meanwhile, Jeremy is forced to consider getting an old friend sectioned.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, sexual content, drug use and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Surinder Duhra, Meredith MacNeill, Shelly Blond

Episodes.Title: Shrooming
Episodes.Plot: Jeremy plans to throw a secret magic mushroom party in the flat, where he hopes to seduce his ex, Big Suze. But when Mark suddenly comes home from work with gastric flu, Jeremy's plans go to pieces.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, sexual content, drug use and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Jessica Claire, Liam Noble, Sophie Winkleman

Episodes.Title: Sistering
Episodes.Plot: Mark's plans for an enjoyable and productive week off work go out the window when his sister comes to stay. Jeremy clearly has the hots for her, and when Mark warns him to back off, Jeremy just wants her more...
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, sexual content, drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Jurying
Episodes.Plot: Jeremy gets called for jury service but soon complicates things by falling for the defendant. Elsewhere, Mark & Sophie go clubbing.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, sexual content, drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Quantocking
Episodes.Plot: Mark worries he and Sophie are drifting apart and proposes. Elsewhere Super-Hans decides to give up drugs, and Jeremy once again gets intimate with past love Big Suze.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, sexual content, drug use and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Geoffrey McGivern, Eryl Maynard, Sophie Winkleman
